Articles.Content:
parts are all nertea's Nearfuture packs. 

First image is the lander entering the atmosphere of Laythe, idk why I Didn't extend the airbrakes. Next few images are of the mothership on a hyperbolic trajectory towards jool, ready to aerocapture. I put it into a really high orbit around Jool, with 0.91 eccentricity using Hyperedit to simulate an entry to the system. Any design suggestions? I allready realize I need a proper reactor,not solar panels for Jool distance and a wider heatshield to cover the entire craft. Also RCS to make turning easier. 

[imgur]http://imgur.com/a/1fGLn[/imgur]

Edited December 31, 2015 by DarthVader

Fixed the link, now to get the album imbeded.
